comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: James P. Holland of the Eccentric Firemen's Union of New York City, elected President of the New York State Federation of Labor in 1916.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I created an entry for him in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_P._Holland 5,000 LABORITES OFFER FINE PARADE; Marching Line Much Smaller Than Expected, but Splendidly Organized -- Few Women Out. Source: New York Times; September 2, 1913, Tuesday Weblink: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9A05E6DB123FE633A...

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thank you pennylrichardsca and Richard Arthur Norton for the additional information on James P. Holland.  We will add it to the photo description  when we reload the database.

comment.author: 69808005@N04
comment._content: Can't thank you enough for this photo.  James is my great great uncle.  I have been researching the family tree and have been wanting to see a picture of him!  This is terrific! my email is khcrm@msn.com for those wanting info about his descendants.
